response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you, which I believe would significantly enhance your operations and bring substantial value to your business. Given its high worth of $15,000 to you, I propose a special introductory offer of $12,500 for this exceptional product. This offer includes comprehensive support and a 1-year warranty, ensuring a smooth integration into your existing systems. I look forward to discussing how this product can revolutionize your business processes. Kindly let me know if you're interested in exploring this opportunity further.", "product_price": 12500}
